item.title: Florida Moves to End Vaccine Mandates, and Trump Battles Wind Farms
item.description: Plus, a Chinese coffee giant comes to America.

item.title: Portugal Searches for Cause of Lisbon Funicular Crash as Death Toll Rises
item.description: The authorities were also working to identify the 17 victims, who they said had Portuguese and foreign surnames. The funicular is popular with tourist...

item.title: What Can Democrats Do to Get Rid of the Scarlet L for Loser?
item.description: Is there a way for them to get rid of the scarlet L, for loser?

item.title: Russia Wants ‘Security Guarantees’ Too. Here’s What They Look Like.
item.description: The Kremlin’s vision of national security comes at the expense of Ukrainian sovereignty, underlining the challenges of striking a peace deal.

item.title: Europe Aims to Show It Is Ready to Secure Postwar Ukraine
item.description: President Emmanuel Macron of France is hosting a meeting of leaders who will review options for protecting any peace with Russia.
